Sentencas: Ni-Zr0.82Y0.18O1.91 (YSZ) and Ni-La0.90Sr0.10ScO2.95 (LSS) cermets for solid oxide and protonic ceramic electrochemical cells were studied by means of H/D isotope exchange with the gas phase equilibration method for the first time.
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: The experiments were carried out at 2 mbar of dry hydrogen in the temperature range of 400-800 degrees C.
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: The three parallel channels of hydrogen surface exchange were found to exist in both Ni-YSZ and Ni-LSS cermets.
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: The mechanism of hydrogen isotope exchange for Ni-YSZ was found to be temperature independent, while, in the case of Ni-LSS, the mechanism changed with temperature and was more complicated at lower temperatures (400-600 degrees C).
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: It was revealed that hydrogen spillover was the rate-determining step for both cermets.
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: The electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation were studied on symmetric cells with a YSZ supported electrolyte and Ni-YSZ electrodes and with an LSS supported electrolyte and Ni-LSS electrodes in a wet (3 vol % H 2O)
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes
H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: The mechanism of hydrogen oxidation on the Ni-LSS electrode differs from that of the Ni-YSZ electrode.
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes

Sentencas: It changes with temperature and is also more complicated at a lower temperature range.
Titulo: H/D isotopic exchange and electrochemical kinetics of hydrogen oxidation on Ni-cermets with oxygen-ionic and protonic electrolytes
